A moder is someone who doesn't follow the rules. And yes, it would be 
allright for you to have G1 Megs, as long as you follow the rules.

To everyone else: I think RDahl has claimed G1 Megs, so the char is 
his.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> What does it mean to say he's a moder? Also would ti be alright if 
I was G1
> Megatron?
